mapper.insert: insert into users(usersid , username , password , realname , sex , birthday , contact , deptid , dutyid , image , status , regdate ) values(#{usersid} , #{username} , #{password} , #{realname} , #{sex} , #{birthday} , #{contact} , #{deptid} , #{dutyid} , #{image} , #{status} , #{regdate} )
mapper.update: update users set username=#{username} , password=#{password} , realname=#{realname} , sex=#{sex} , birthday=#{birthday} , contact=#{contact} , deptid=#{deptid} , dutyid=#{dutyid} , image=#{image} , status=#{status} , regdate=#{regdate} where usersid=#{usersid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.deptname , c.dutyname from users a , dept b , duty c where a.deptid = b.deptid and a.dutyid = c.dutyid order by usersid desc
select a.* , b.deptname , c.dutyname from users a , dept b , duty c where a.deptid = b.deptid and a.dutyid = c.dutyid and usersid=#{usersid} order by usersid desc

select a.* , b.deptname , c.dutyname from users a , dept b , duty c where a.deptid = b.deptid and a.dutyid = c.dutyid
and a.username like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{username}, '%'))
